name: Trail Of Gold: Incredibly Heavy Load of The Cursed Bloody Metal
name_original: Trail Of Gold: Incredibly Heavy Load of The Cursed Bloody Metal
description:
Controls:  

  • Mouse cursor: Aim
  • Click (and hold): Shoot
  • Tab or 1-6: Switch gun (if you've looted any)
  • Esc: Exit Game and submit score

Rules:

Shoot enemies to gain gold

But every shot spends gold

No gold = Game Over

Made by BeardyBard for LD40
